1250989018959708161.rules:
# ğŸ› ï¸ **Minecraft Server Rules**  

## ğŸš« No Griefing  
Do not destroy or alter other players' structures without their permission.  

## ğŸ› ï¸ Exploits and Glitches  
- **âŒ Prohibited:** Major exploits like duplication glitches, hacking, or methods to crash/kick players.  
- **âœ… Allowed:** Minor exploits (e.g., string duplication). Use at your own discretion.  

## âš”ï¸ No Spawn Killing  
Killing players at or near the spawn point is strictly forbidden and will result in **2 warnings**.  

## ğŸ”„ No Alternate Accounts  
Only **one account per player** is allowed. Second accounts will be permanently banned.  

--------------------------------------------------------------------

## âš ï¸ **Warning System**  
A **3-strike system** is in place:  
- **1 Warning:** Minor offenses (e.g., x-ray, minor rule violations).  
- **2 Warnings:** Serious offenses (e.g., disrupting gameplay, aggressive cheating).  
- **3 Warnings:** Severe violations (e.g., hacking, doxxing, repeated offenses).  

**ğŸ“Œ If you accumulate 3 or more warnings, you will receive a 4-week ban.**  
*Note: Warnings are permanent until the current season ends.*  

------------------------------------------------------------------

## ğŸ’¬ Respect Other Players  
Be respectful and kind to others. Toxic behavior or harassment will not be tolerated.  

## ğŸš« No NSFW Content  
Any inappropriate or explicit content is strictly prohibited.  

## ğŸ”’ No Doxxing  
Sharing personal or private information about others is a **serious offense**. This will result in **3 warnings and an immediate ban**.

# ğŸ“œ Server Rules for HoneyBerriesâ€™ Modding Hub

Welcome to the community! To keep this space safe, productive, and fun for everyone, please follow the rules below.  

## ğŸ› ï¸ 1. General Conduct

1. **Be Respectful**  
   - Treat everyone with kindness and courtesy.  
   - Harassment, hate speech, personal attacks, or toxic behavior will not be tolerated.  

2. **No Spam or Flooding**  
   - Donâ€™t spam messages, emojis, GIFs, or mass pings.  
   - Keep channels clear and easy to follow.  

3. **Keep Content Appropriate**  
   - No NSFW, illegal, or overly profane content.  
   - When in doubt, keep it family-friendly.  


## ğŸ“ 2. Modding & Development Etiquette

4. **Stay On-Topic**  
   - Use channels for their intended purpose (e.g. <#1349252575307763712>  for bugs, <#1349252467153571912> for ideas).  
   - Casual conversation belongs in <#1345655989424357509> .  

5. **Respect Credit & Licensing**  
   - Always credit code, assets, or tutorials you use.  
   - Follow open-source licenses and get permission before using proprietary work.  

6. **No Unsolicited Promotion**  
   - You may share your own projects in <#1349252385327026198>  only.  
   - Advertising unrelated servers, products, or services is prohibited.  


## ğŸš¨ 3. Enforcement & Appeals

7. **Follow Staff Guidance**  
   - Moderators and admins have final say.  
   - If you disagree with a decision, appeal privately via DMâ€”never argue in public channels.  

8. **Use Common Sense**  
   - Not every situation is covered by these rules.  
   - If something feels off, ask a moderator before acting.  

> **Penalties**  
> - First Offense â†’ Warning  
> - Second Offense â†’ Temporary mute/timeout  
> - Third Offense â†’ Kick or ban (depending on severity)  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ğŸ“¢ **By participating in this server, you agree to follow these rules.**

# ğŸ“œ Minecraaft Server Rules

Welcome to the Gem SMP Discord server! To ensure a fun and fair experience for all players, please follow these rules:

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

## 1ï¸âƒ£ Respect Other Players
Be respectful and kind to others. Toxic behavior or harassment will not be tolerated.

## 2ï¸âƒ£ No Griefing
Do not destroy or alter other players' structures without their permission.

## 3ï¸âƒ£ No Spawn Killing
Killing players at or near the spawn point is strictly forbidden.

## 4ï¸âƒ£ No NSFW Content
Any inappropriate or explicit content is strictly prohibited.

## 5ï¸âƒ£ No Doxxing
Sharing personal or private information about others is a serious offense. This will result in 3 warnings and an immediate ban.

## 6ï¸âƒ£ No Alternate Accounts
Only one account is allowed per player. Second accounts will be permanently banned.

## 7ï¸âƒ£ Exploits and Glitches
Major exploits, like duplication glitches, hacking, or methods to crash the server, are prohibited. Minor exploits, like string duplication, are allowed at your own discretion.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

## âš ï¸ Rule Enforcement
We use a 3-strike warning system:
- **1 Warning:** Minor offenses (e.g., x-ray, minor rule violations).
- **2 Warnings:** Serious offenses (e.g., disrupting gameplay, aggressive cheating).
- **3 Warnings:** Severe violations (e.g., hacking, doxxing, repeated offenses).

If you get 3 or more warnings, you will receive a 4-week ban. Warnings are permanent until the current season ends.
